001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.*;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureMatrices;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
008
009public class L2Regularization<N extends Number> implements GradientDescentOptimizer.Interceptor<N> {
010
011    private N lambda;
012
013    public L2Regularization(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
014        this(typeSupport.zero());
015    }
016
017    public L2Regularization(N lambda) {
018        this.lambda = lambda;
019    }
020
021    public N getLambda() {
022        return lambda;
023    }
024
025    public void setLambda(N lambda) {
026        this.lambda = lambda;
027    }
028
029    @Override
030    public Vector<N> interceptGradients(int epoch, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model, DataSet<N> trainSet, GradientDescentOptimizer<N> optimizer, Vector<N> gradients) {
031        N[] parameters = model.getParameters();
032        Vector<N> thetas = Vectors.of(model.getCurrentNumberType(), parameters).transpose();
033        Vector<N> regularization = thetas.multiply(lambda);
034        return gradients.add(regularization);
035    }
036}
